s: I have used so many different products ... brands to expensive salon lines. I love this more than anything else I've ever tried! The scent is also very lovely, in my opinion. It does tame my frizz some, but not completely on its own. In my experience, no rinse out conditioner can do that alone. I always follow with a leave-in and some sort of styling product. The quality of my hair has definitely improved since I started using it over a month ago. ... I am absolutely in LOVE with Terax...
